title: The multi-storeyed temporary transit camp shall be provided on the site itself or outside the SRA project site on portion of plot which is not designated / reserved for public purpose or not affected by road widening and is preferably close to the site
clause_text: The multi-storeyed temporary transit camp shall be provided on the site itself or outside the SRA project site on portion of plot which is not designated / reserved for public purpose or not affected by road widening and is preferably close to the site.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: The multi-storeyed temporary transit camp shall be provided on the site itself or outside the SRA project site on portion of plot which is not designated / reserved for public purpose or not affected
